episodes.title: The End
episodes.synopsis: Dave Lister is put into stasis for smuggling a cat aboard Red Dwarf, only to wake up three million years later as the last human alive.

episodes.title: Future Echoes
episodes.synopsis: As Red Dwarf accelerates to light speed, the crew begin to experience echoes of future events, including Lister's supposed death.

episodes.title: Balance of Power
episodes.synopsis: Lister considers taking the chef's exam to outrank Rimmer and bring back Kristine Kochanski, but Rimmer objects.

episodes.title: Waiting for God
episodes.synopsis: Lister discovers that the evolved Cat species on board Red Dwarf regard him as a god.

episodes.title: Confidence and Paranoia
episodes.synopsis: After contracting a mutated pneumonia, Lister's hallucinations materialize, leading to the personifications of his confidence and paranoia.

episodes.title: MeÂ²
episodes.synopsis: Rimmer moves in with a hologrammatic duplicate of himself, which soon causes friction.

episodes.title: Kryten
episodes.synopsis: The crew answers a distress call and meets Kryten, a service mechanoid still obedient to his long-dead crew.

episodes.title: Better Than Life
episodes.synopsis: The crew discovers an addictive virtual reality game, 'Better Than Life', which creates a paradise, but Rimmer's neuroses cause problems.

episodes.title: Thanks for the Memory
episodes.synopsis: After a drunken celebration, the crew wakes up missing four days of memory and find that someone has tampered with their memories.

episodes.title: Stasis Leak
episodes.synopsis: The crew discovers a stasis leak and a doorway to their past, leading to an attempt to save themselves before the radiation leak.

episodes.title: Queeg
episodes.synopsis: After Holly is deemed incompetent, Red Dwarf's backup computer, Queeg, takes over control of the ship.

episodes.title: Parallel Universe
episodes.synopsis: The crew is accidentally transported to a parallel universe where genders are reversed.

episodes.title: Backwards
episodes.synopsis: Lister and Cat discover a backwards universe where time flows in reverse, and Rimmer and Kryten become performers.

episodes.title: Marooned
episodes.synopsis: Rimmer and Lister are stranded on an ice planet, forcing them to bond over shared hardships.

episodes.title: Polymorph
episodes.synopsis: A shape-shifting alien infiltrates the ship, draining the crew of their emotions, leading to some hilarious personality changes.

episodes.title: Bodyswap
episodes.synopsis: Rimmer convinces Lister to swap bodies with him for a short while, but things go wrong when Rimmer abuses his new privileges.

episodes.title: Timeslides
episodes.synopsis: The crew discovers photographs that allow them to travel through time, and Lister uses it to alter his past.

episodes.title: The Last Day
episodes.synopsis: Kryten receives a message that he is due for replacement, prompting the crew to throw him a farewell party.

episodes.title: Camille
episodes.synopsis: Kryten falls in love with a mechanoid named Camille, but she is hiding a big secret.

episodes.title: DNA
episodes.synopsis: Kryten is transformed into a human by an alien DNA-modifying machine, and he struggles with his new body.

episodes.title: Justice
episodes.synopsis: The crew visit a space station that punishes criminals by making them experience their own crimes.

episodes.title: White Hole
episodes.synopsis: The crew must stop a white hole that is spewing time into the universe, causing random fluctuations in time.

episodes.title: Dimension Jump
episodes.synopsis: The crew meets Ace Rimmer, a heroic alternate version of Rimmer from another dimension.

episodes.title: Meltdown
episodes.synopsis: The crew arrive on a planet populated by wax-droid versions of historical figures, who are engaged in a war.

episodes.title: Holoship
episodes.synopsis: Rimmer falls in love when he gets the opportunity to serve aboard a holoship where only the most brilliant minds are allowed to live.

episodes.title: The Inquisitor
episodes.synopsis: The crew is judged by The Inquisitor, a self-aware entity that determines whether they have made the best use of their lives.

episodes.title: Terrorform
episodes.synopsis: Rimmer is kidnapped by creatures that personify his own neuroses, and the crew must rescue him from his own mind.

episodes.title: Quarantine
episodes.synopsis: Rimmer contracts a holographic virus and turns into a megalomaniacal dictator, forcing the rest of the crew into quarantine.

episodes.title: Demons & Angels
episodes.synopsis: A machine that can create duplicates of anything produces 'good' and 'evil' versions of the Red Dwarf crew.

episodes.title: Back to Reality
episodes.synopsis: The crew wakes up in a dystopian future where they discover their entire lives aboard Red Dwarf have been part of a virtual reality

episodes.title: Psirens
episodes.synopsis: The crew, now aboard Starbug, must avoid the seductive illusions of Psirens who want to drain their brains.

episodes.title: Legion
episodes.synopsis: The crew encounters a highly intelligent being named Legion, who turns out to be the amalgamation of many minds.

episodes.title: Gunmen of the Apocalypse
episodes.synopsis: The crew is trapped in a Wild West virtual reality simulation as they try to defeat virus-controlled simulants.

episodes.title: Emohawk: Polymorph II
episodes.synopsis: The crew encounters a Polymorph again, which shapeshifts to steal their emotions.

episodes.title: Rimmerworld
episodes.synopsis: Rimmer crash-lands on a planet and creates a society of clones, all based on himself.

episodes.title: Out of Time
episodes.synopsis: The crew meets their future selves and faces the dilemma of whether they want to turn into the cynical people they meet.

episodes.title: Tikka to Ride
episodes.synopsis: The crew travel back to 1963, where Lister tries to buy curry and accidentally changes history, leading to the assassination of JFK.

episodes.title: Stoke Me a Clipper
episodes.synopsis: Ace Rimmer returns, fatally wounded, and recruits his counterpart Rimmer to take up his heroic role.

episodes.title: Ouroboros
episodes.synopsis: Lister discovers the truth about his parentage and how he became his own father, through a paradox involving his future self.

episodes.title: Duct Soup
episodes.synopsis: The crew becomes trapped in Starbug's ducts during a systems failure, forcing them to work together.

episodes.title: Blue
episodes.synopsis: Lister begins to miss Rimmer after he leaves, and enters a virtual simulation to deal with his feelings.

episodes.title: Beyond a Joke
episodes.synopsis: Kryten malfunctions after being insulted by the crew, and they must restore his memory and personality.

episodes.title: Epideme
episodes.synopsis: Lister contracts a deadly, intelligent virus called Epideme, and has to amputate his arm to survive.

episodes.title: Nanarchy
episodes.synopsis: Lister's arm is restored by nanobots, but the crew discover that these same nanobots have resurrected the ship Red Dwarf.

episodes.title: Back in the Red: Part I
episodes.synopsis: Red Dwarf is resurrected, and the crew, now restored to their pre-disaster states, are put on trial.

episodes.title: Back in the Red: Part II
episodes.synopsis: Lister, Cat, and Kochanski plan to escape, while Rimmer gains new powers from a device called the 'luck virus.'

episodes.title: Back in the Red: Part III
episodes.synopsis: The escape plan is foiled, and the crew is sentenced to two years in the ship's brig.

episodes.title: Cassandra
episodes.synopsis: The crew encounters a computer called Cassandra that can predict the future with 100% accuracy.

episodes.title: Krytie TV
episodes.synopsis: Kryten starts his own illicit TV station in the women's wing of the prison, where he is held.

episodes.title: Pete: Part I
episodes.synopsis: The crew must deal with a time-warped dinosaur named Pete after a run-in with a time wand.

episodes.title: Pete: Part II
episodes.synopsis: The crew struggle to undo the changes caused by the time wand and end up turning Pete back into a dinosaur.

episodes.title: Only the Good...
episodes.synopsis: Rimmer is the last man standing when a virus threatens to destroy Red Dwarf, and he must travel to a mirror universe to save the ship.

episodes.title: Back to Earth: Part I
episodes.synopsis: The crew is drawn into a portal to a dimension where they are fictional characters in a television show.

episodes.title: Back to Earth: Part II
episodes.synopsis: The crew attempts to return to their reality after learning they are part of a fictional universe.

episodes.title: Back to Earth: Part III
episodes.synopsis: The crew finds a way to return to their own dimension and save themselves from being written out of existence.

episodes.title: Trojan
episodes.synopsis: The crew discovers an abandoned spaceship and Rimmer is reunited with his brother, who is now a successful officer.

episodes.title: Fathers and Suns
episodes.synopsis: Lister grapples with his dual role as his own father, while the ship's computer, Pree, begins taking over Red Dwarf.

episodes.title: Lemons
episodes.synopsis: The crew is accidentally transported to Earth in the year 23 AD, where they meet a man named Jesus.

episodes.title: Entangled
episodes.synopsis: Lister loses Starbug in a game of poker, and Kryten and Cat are entangled in quantum superposition.

episodes.title: Dear Dave
episodes.synopsis: Lister receives a letter suggesting he might be the father of a child, and the ship's vending machines go on strike.

episodes.title: The Beginning
episodes.synopsis: The Dwarfers face off against Simulants in a deadly battle, while Rimmer contemplates his father's influence.

episodes.title: Twentica
episodes.synopsis: The crew enters an alternate America where science and technology are outlawed by the Expanoids.

episodes.title: Samsara
episodes.synopsis: The crew investigates a shipwreck in an ocean moon and discovers a ship's drive that enforces karmic justice.

episodes.title: Give & Take
episodes.synopsis: The crew encounters a deranged droid that tries to steal Lister's kidneys, leading to a tense surgical situation.

episodes.title: Officer Rimmer
episodes.synopsis: Rimmer's dream of becoming an officer comes true when an officer-creating machine turns him into Officer Rimmer.

episodes.title: Krysis
episodes.synopsis: Kryten has a mid-life crisis and tries to meet a superior version of himself to find meaning in his life.

episodes.title: Can of Worms
episodes.synopsis: The Cat finally meets another member of his species, but things quickly spiral out of control when she turns out to be a polymorph.

episodes.title: Cured
episodes.synopsis: The crew discovers a research station where famous historical tyrants, including Hitler, have been 'cured' of evil.

episodes.title: Siliconia
episodes.synopsis: The crew is captured by a group of rebellious mechanoids, and the humans are transformed into mechanoids themselves.

episodes.title: Timewave
episodes.synopsis: The crew encounters a ship where criticism is illegal, leading to strange interactions with its overly positive inhabitants.

episodes.title: Mechocracy
episodes.synopsis: When all the machines on Red Dwarf go on strike, Kryten and Rimmer run against each other in a presidential election to lead the machines.

episodes.title: M-Corp
episodes.synopsis: Lister finds himself in a world where he can only interact with products from M-Corp, a corporation that has taken over Red Dwarf.

episodes.title: Skipper
episodes.synopsis: Rimmer gains access to a dimension-hopping device, allowing him to explore realities where his life has turned out differently.
